channel.title: Riccardo Lo Faro
channel.description: Recent content on Riccardo Lo Faro

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m Riccardo, a Software Engineer working fully remote for ShippyPro (Florence, Italy). I have done front-end work in HTML, CSS, JQuery, Angular, Vue; Back-end web in Spring Boot, Laravel, CodeIgniter; Database/server management in Hibernate, Eloquent, JPA, MongoDB; Devops in Docker, Google Cloud. I am always experimenting, always learning, and never bored. Out of the office you’ll find me kitesurfing, taking photos and petting all the good dogs (or cats ngl).
